nodes.text: Asgar Ro was a male individual who held the title of Eye of the Nihil in the Nihil marauder group. Along with his son, Marchion, Ro abandoned his homeworld to take control and reorganize the Nihil, at that point a small gang, utilizing the Paths generated through hyperspace by Mari San Tekka to undertake operations. Ro was eventually killed and succeeded by Marchion, who believed that one of the Nihil's three Tempest Runners had murdered his father.

Asgar Ro was first mentioned in the novel The High Republic: Light of the Jedi, written by Charles Soule and released in 2021. He later debuted in flashbacks in the 2021 novel The High Republic: The Rising Storm, written by Cavan Scott. In the upcoming audio drama The High Republic: Tempest Runner, Ro will be voiced by Jonathan Davis.
